## Problem or Opportunity
Describe the problem you're trying to solve or the opportunity you see.

## Proposed Solution
Describe what you'd like to see implemented.

## Alternatives Considered
Any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Additional Context
Any other context, examples, or references that would be helpful.
